get.description: Get the current status of Advanced Security for the organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: includeAllProperties
parameters.description: When true, also determine if pushes are blocked if they contain secrets

patch.description: Update the status of Advanced Security for the organization

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The new status

get.description: Get commiters used when calculating billing information.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: plan
parameters.description: The plan to query. Plans supported: CodeSecurity and SecretProtection. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: billingDate
parameters.description: The date to query, or if not provided, today

get.description: Estimate the pushers that would be added to the customer's usage if Advanced Security was enabled for this organization.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: plan
parameters.description: The plan to query.

get.description: Get the current status of Advanced Security for a project

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: includeAllProperties
parameters.description: When true, also determine if pushes are blocked if they contain secrets

patch.description: Update the status of Advanced Security for the project

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The new status

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

get.description: Estimate the pushers that would be added to the customer's usage if Advanced Security was enabled for this project.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

get.description: Determines if Code Security, Secret Protection, and their features are enabled for the repository.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: The name or ID of the repository

parameters.name: includeAllProperties
parameters.description: When true, will also determine if pushes are blocked when secrets are detected

patch.description: Update the enablement status of Code Security and Secret Protection, along with their respective features, for a given repository.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: new status

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: Name or ID of the repository

get.description: Estimate the pushers that would be added to the customer's usage if Advanced Security was enabled for this repository.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: The name or ID of the repository

parameters.name: plan
parameters.description: The plan to query.

codeQLEnabled.description: CodeQL default setup enablement status set to False when not using default setup and True when using default setup; Null is never explicitly set.

dependencyScanningInjectionEnabled.description:
Dependency Scanning Injection enablement status set to False when disabled and True when enabled; Null is never explicitly set.
If Advanced Security is NOT already enabled, behavior will depend on if Advanced Security is to be enabled/disabled. DependencyScanningInjectionEnabled will not affect anything in this scenario.
If Advanced Security is to be disabled, the value of DependencyScanningInjectionEnabled will have no effect.
Setting Dependency Scanning enablement state is only supported for repo enablement and not org or project enablement at this time.

enableBlockPushesOnCreate.description: Automatically enable blocking of pushes that contain secrets. If EnableOnCreate is not enabled this feature cannot be enabled.

enableCodeQLOnCreate.description: Automatically enable CodeQL. If EnableOnCreate is not enabled this feature cannot be enabled.

enableDependabotOnCreate.description: Automatically enable Dependabot. If EnableOnCreate is not enabled this feature cannot be enabled.

enableDependencyScanningInjectionOnCreat.description: Automatically enable Dependency Scanning Injection. If EnableOnCreate is not enabled this feature cannot be enabled.

enableOnCreate.description: Automatically enable Advanced Security on newly created repositories.

enableBlockPushesOnCreate.description: Automatically enable blocking of pushes that contain secrets. If EnableOnCreate is not enabled this feature cannot be enabled.

enableCodeQLOnCreate.description: Automatically enable CodeQL. If EnableOnCreate is not enabled this feature cannot be enabled.

enableDependabotOnCreate.description: Automatically enable Dependabot. If EnableOnCreate is not enabled this feature cannot be enabled.

enableDependencyScanningInjectionOnCreat.description: Automatically enable Dependency Scanning Injection. If EnableOnCreate is not enabled this feature cannot be enabled.

enableOnCreate.description: Automatically enable Advanced Security on newly created repositories.

advSecEnablementLastChangedDate.description: The last time the status of Advanced Security for this repository was updated

advSecEnabled.description: Advanced Security enablement status set to False when disabled and True when enabled; Null is never explicitly set.

advSecEnablementFeatures.description: Includes additional features that can be enabled alongside Advanced Security.

blockPushes.description:
When true, pushes containing secrets will be blocked.
When false, pushes are scanned for secrets and are not blocked.
If includeAllProperties in the request is false, this value will be null.

AgentPoolDetails.description: This Data Contract contains the Advanced Security CodeQL One Click Details Panel Information

allAvailableAgentPools.description: List of All Available agent pools in the org

currentAgentPool.description: Currently selected pool Advanced Security is Using

BillableCommitterDetails.description: Billable Committers Details for Advanced Security Services

projectId.description: Project Id commit was pushed to.

projectName.description: Project name commit was pushed to.

pushedTime.description: Time of the push that contained the commit.

pushId.description: Push Id that contained the commit.

repoName.description: Repository name commit was pushed to.

BilledCommitter.description: Information related to billed committers using Advanced Security services

cuid.description: Cuid of the billed committer. CUID is unique across an Azure Subscription.

userIdentity.description: Identity Reference object of the billed committer

billedUsers.description: A list of BilledCommitter objects that contain the identityRef of committers.

uniqueCommitterCount.description: Count of billed committers in BilledUsers

codeSecurityFeatures.description: Includes code security features that can be enabled.

enablementOnCreateSettings.description: Auto enablement setting for newly created repositories.

reposEnablementStatus.description: A list of enablement statuses for repositories within the specified organization or project.

secretProtectionFeatures.description: Includes secret protection features that can be enabled.

codeQLEnabled.description: CodeQL default setup enablement status set to False when not using default setup and True when using default setup; Null is never explicitly set.

codeSecurityChangedBy.description: The VSID of the last user who modified the enablement status of Code Security.

codeSecurityEnabled.description: Code Security enablement status set to False when disabled and True when enabled; Null is never explicitly set.

codeSecurityEnablementLastChangedDate.description: The last time the status of Code Security for this repository was updated

dependencyScanningInjectionEnabled.description:
Dependency Scanning Injection enablement status set to False when disabled and True when enabled; Null is never explicitly set.
If Advanced Security is NOT already enabled, behavior will depend on if Advanced Security is to be enabled/disabled. DependencyScanningInjectionEnabled will not affect anything in this scenario.
If Advanced Security is to be disabled, the value of DependencyScanningInjectionEnabled will have no effect.

enableBlockPushesOnCreate.description: Automatically enable blocking of pushes that contain secrets when Secret Protection is auto-enabled. If EnableSecretProtectionOnCreate is not true this flag is ignored.

enableCodeQLOnCreate.description: Automatically enable CodeQL when Code Security is auto-enabled. If EnableCodeSecurityOnCreate is not true this flag is ignored.

enableCodeSecurityOnCreate.description: Automatically enable Code Security on newly created repositories.

enableDependabotOnCreate.description: Automatically enable Dependabot when Code Security is auto-enabled. If EnableCodeSecurityOnCreate is not true this flag is ignored.

enableDependencyScanningInjectionOnCreat.description: Automatically enable Dependency Scanning Injection when Code Security is auto-enabled. If EnableCodeSecurityOnCreate is not true this flag is ignored.

enableSecretProtectionOnCreate.description: Automatically enable Secret Protection on newly created repositories.

_links.description: This field contains zero or more interesting links about the graph subject. These links may be invoked to obtain additional relationships or more detailed information about this graph subject.

descriptor.description: The descriptor is the primary way to reference the graph subject while the system is running. This field will uniquely identify the same graph subject across both Accounts and Organizations.

displayName.description: This is the non-unique display name of the graph subject. To change this field, you must alter its value in the source provider.

url.description: This url is the full route to the source resource of this graph subject.

directoryAlias.description: Deprecated - Can be retrieved by querying the Graph user referenced in the "self" entry of the IdentityRef "_links" dictionary

imageUrl.description: Deprecated - Available in the "avatar" entry of the IdentityRef "_links" dictionary

inactive.description: Deprecated - Can be retrieved by querying the Graph membership state referenced in the "membershipState" entry of the GraphUser "_links" dictionary

isAadIdentity.description: Deprecated - Can be inferred from the subject type of the descriptor (Descriptor.IsAadUserType/Descriptor.IsAadGroupType)

isContainer.description: Deprecated - Can be inferred from the subject type of the descriptor (Descriptor.IsGroupType)

profileUrl.description: Deprecated - not in use in most preexisting implementations of ToIdentityRef

MeterUsage.description: Information related to billing for Advanced Security services

billedCommitters.description: Deprecated - use BilledCommittersIdentities instead A list of Cuids for the commiters to the repositories that have Advanced Security features enabled

billedUsers.description: A list of BilledCommitter objects that contain the identityRef of committers that have AdvSec enabled

billingDate.description: The date this billing information pertains to

isAdvSecBillable.description: True when a bill is generated for Advanced Security feature usage in this organziation

isAdvSecEnabled.description: True when Advanced Security features are enabled in this organization

uniqueCommitterCount.description: The number of commiters to repositories that have Advanced Security features enabled

MeterUsageEstimate.description: Information related to meter usage estimate for Code Security plan and/or Secret Protection plan

codeSecurityMeterUsageEstimate.description: Meter usage estimate when enabling Code Security plan

secretProtectionMeterUsageEstimate.description: Meter usage estimate when enabling Secret Protection plan

MeterUsageForPlan.description: Information related to meter usage for a Scanning plan

billedUsers.description: The identityRef of committers that contributed to repositories with Scanning plan enabled

billingDate.description: The date this billing information pertains to

isPlanEnabled.description: True when the Scanning plan is enabled in this organization

ReferenceLinks.description: The class to represent a collection of REST reference links.

links.description: The readonly view of the links.  Because Reference links are readonly, we only want to expose them as read only.

codeSecurityFeatures.description: Includes Code Security features that can be enabled.

secretProtectionFeatures.description: Includes Secret Protection features that can be enabled.

blockPushes.description:
When true, pushes containing secrets will be blocked.
When false, pushes are scanned for secrets and are not blocked.
If includeAllProperties in the request is false, this value will be null.

secretProtectionChangedBy.description: The VSID of the last user who modified the enablement status of Secret Protection.

secretProtectionEnabled.description: Secret Protection enablement status set to False when disabled and True when enabled; Null is never explicitly set.

secretProtectionEnablementLastChangedDat.description: The last time the status of Secret Protection for this repository was updated

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.3.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.3.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.3' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.advsec: Grants the ability to read alerts, result instances, analysis result instances
scopes.vso.advsec_manage: Grants the ability to access sarif upload information, delete analysis, and update alerts
